name: coffeescript-koans
description: CoffeeScript Koans is an interactive learning environment that uses failing tests to introduce students to aspects of CoffeeScript in a logical sequence.

scripts.test: mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script -R spec test/about_asserts.coffee && mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script -R spec test/about_assignment.coffee && mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script -R spec test/about_functions.coffee

author: Liam McLennan
